message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm really interested in the product, but $100 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  How about $90?  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $90 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $95.
